org.datavec.local.transforms.misc

Class SequenceWritablesToStringFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.local.transforms.misc.SequenceWritablesToStringFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<java.util.List<java.util.List<Writable>>,java.lang.String>

    public class SequenceWritablesToStringFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function<java.util.List<java.util.List<Writable>>,java.lang.String>
    Simple function to map sequence examples to a String format (such as CSV) with given quote around the string value if it contains the delimiter.
